name: Sneki Snacker
description:
Razer's WAKKA WAKKA Wallpaper made into a game. This took roughly 3 days worth of smacking my head against a wall. 

A bunch of commenters asked Razer for a playable version and I took it as a challenge. Enjoy the gimmick!

Based off of Razer's WAKKA WAKKA Wallpaper:

Created mostly by following a tutorial by Zigurous: 

Follow me on Twitch and Twitter for more updates.
